column1: Smoque BBQ////I can't comment on the service or surroundings (thanks
column2: hubby!) but their brisket was some of the best I've ever had
column3: as was the pulled pork. Both were incredibly moist with just the right amount of smoke. Delicious. The sides were not anything too special (mac n cheese
column5: but not bad. Everything was packaged really well though
column6: and I'd certainly return over and over for that brisket. Yum!
